solution_line_template: First find the number of saplings that sprout: {cherry_pits_planted} pits * {sprout_percentage_num}% = <<{cherry_pits_planted}*{sprout_percentage_num}*{percent_to_decimal_factor}={sprouted_saplings}>>{sprouted_saplings} saplings

Then subtract the number she sold to find the number she has left: {sprouted_saplings} saplings - {saplings_sold} saplings = <<{sprouted_saplings}-{saplings_sold}={saplings_left}>>{saplings_left} saplings
